casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Darrell Lee MELTON No. 253PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. Matthew Thomas Tulchin, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Ms. Kathryn L. VandeBerg, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Melton, Darrell Lee. Greg Newman, District Attorney.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of July 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
